org.jetel.graph

Class EdgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.EdgeBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferedEdge, BufferedFastPropagateEdge, DirectEdge, DirectEdgeFastPropagate, LRemoteEdge, PhaseConnectionEdge, RRemoteDirectEdge

    public abstract class EdgeBase
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents Edge - data connection between two NODEs
    Since:
    April 2, 2002
    See Also:
    InputPort, OutputPort

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean eofSent
      This flag indicates eof mark has been already sent to this edge, eof() method has been already invoked.
      protected Edge proxy 
      protected boolean verbose
      Is the graph running in verbose mode?

      • proxy

        protected Edge proxy

      • verbose

        protected boolean verbose
        Is the graph running in verbose mode? Cache of GraphRuntimeContext.isVerboseMode() variable.

      • eofSent

        protected volatile boolean eofSent
        This flag indicates eof mark has been already sent to this edge, eof() method has been already invoked.
